name: Springfield Botanical Gardens
description: A 114-acre garden featuring themed gardens, a butterfly house, and beautiful walking trails.

name: Discovery Center
address: 438 E St. Louis St, Springfield, ST
description: Interactive science museum perfect for families with hands-on exhibits about science and technology.

name: Historic Downtown
description: Charming historic district with unique shops, restaurants, and preserved 19th-century architecture.

name: Riverside Park
description: Scenic park along the river with walking trails, picnic areas, and outdoor concert venue.

name: Springfield Art Museum
description: Premier art museum featuring American and European works with rotating contemporary exhibits.

name: Fantastic Caverns
description: America's only ride-through cave, offering a unique underground experience for all ages.

name: Hammons Field
description: Home of the Springfield Cardinals minor league baseball team with family-friendly atmosphere.

name: Wilson's Creek National Battlefield
description: Historic Civil War battlefield with museum, driving tour, and hiking trails through the preserved landscape.
